Articles.Content: Some time ago, developers were going to add the resource system to the game. They showed different tables, diagrams and parts, etc. But more mention was not. Maybe I missed something, or the idea was rejected. What do you think about this?
They've set it aside to focus efforts on career mode and will return to it once career is at a point they are comfortable with. That is all we know on the subject.

Resources are going to be a big part of career mode so you can be that we'll see somethin' in the way of them in the next couple patches. Though I think at the moment, they're focusing more on UI and framework stuff.

But resources can't be that far off, it's one of the most demanded features right now
